title: Find Familiar
content:
s meow can distract your enemies. Find Familiar: Crab Summon a crab familiar. Its sharp pincers can slow enemies. Find Familiar: Rat Summon a rat familiar. Its infectious bite can spread disease. Find Familiar: Scratch Any character with Scratch's Ball can summon Scratch. Scratch will automatically be dismissed if his summoner returns to camp. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None Ritual Spell: Yes
